DOC.brief_title: Study Estimate Pharmacokinetics , Bioavailability Effect Food Single Dose Modified-release Lersivirine 500 mg Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Subjects willing able comply schedule visit , treatment plan , laboratory test , study procedure . History regular alcohol consumption exceed 14 drinks/week female 21 drinks/week male ( 1 drink = 5 ounce ( 150 mL ) wine 12 ounce ( 360 mL ) beer 1.5 ounce ( 45 mL ) hard liquor ) within 6 month Screening ; Treatment investigational drug within 60 day ( determined local requirement , whichever long ) 5 halflives precede first dose study medication ; Use prescription nonprescription drug dietary supplement within 7 day 5 halflives ( whichever longer ) prior first dose study medication .
